sentence: Reasons for exclusion were recorded and presented in a PRISMA-ScR flow diagram (Figure 1).

Characteristics of Included Sources of Evidence
A PRISMA-ScR flow diagram (Figure 1) outlines the results of the search and screening process, including reasons for the exclusion of full-text papers [25].
Most sources of evidence (46/57) were published in the past decade, with 33% (n = 19) published in the past five years (Figure 2).

Circus activities utilised in interventions.Figure 4 describes the “Where” [3] or context [23] of the interventions.

The outcomes aiming to enhance health and well-being varied depending on the characteristics of the participants (as described earlier in this paper) but can be categorised into physical and/or social-emotional outcomes (see Figure 5 and Appendix E for details relating to extracted outcomes).
Reasons for exclusion were recorded and presented in a PRISMA-ScR flow diagram (Figure 1).

Characteristics of Included Sources of Evidence
A PRISMA-ScR flow diagram (Figure 1) outlines the results of the search and screening process, including reasons for the exclusion of full-text papers [25].
Most sources of evidence (46/57) were published in the past decade, with 33% (n = 19) published in the past five years (Figure 2).

The outcomes aiming to enhance health and well-being varied depending on the characteristics of the participants (as described earlier in this paper) but can be categorised into physical and/or social-emotional outcomes (see Figure 5 and Appendix E for details relating to extracted outcomes).
Reasons for exclusion were recorded and presented in a PRISMA-ScR flow diagram (Figure 1).

A PRISMA-ScR flow diagram (Figure 1) outlines the results of the search and screening process, including reasons for the exclusion of full-text papers [25].
Most sources of evidence (46/57) were published in the past decade, with 33% (n = 19) published in the past five years (Figure 2).
